pos_mean_info_list.mean: 发训令（过去式mandamused，过去分词mandamused，现在分词mandamusing，第三人称单数mandamuses）

bilingual.source: Give an unequivocal legal mandate for air strikes
bilingual.target: 对空袭下达明确合法的命令

bilingual.source: Note again, that it is an irresistible mandate.
bilingual.target: 这是一个不可抗拒的命令。

bilingual.source: She is the evil wolf king's host, also merely she just has the ability mandate those evil wolves.
bilingual.target: 她可是魔狼王的主人，也只有她才有能力命令那些魔狼。

bilingual.source: The Pakistani government has described the incident as a violation of its sovereignty and the mandate of international forces in Afghanistan.
bilingual.target: 巴基斯坦政府称这起事件侵犯了巴方主权，也违反了国际部队在阿富汗的命令。

bilingual.source: The prosecutor must act independently and apolitically to fulfill his mandate and is not empowered to make decisions about peace and security.
bilingual.target: 检察官必须独立地非政治性地履行他的命令，并且没权做出关于和平和安全的决定。

bilingual.source: An antidote might be for the coalition to seek an expansion of the U. N. mandate allowing the West to assist the rebels.
bilingual.target: 要解决这样的僵局，对于多国部队而言，办法之一可能是要向联合国寻求一项扩大化的命令以允许西方国家给与反叛军支持。

bilingual.source: An antidote might be for the coalition to seek an expansion of the U.N. mandate allowing the West to assist the rebels.
bilingual.target: 要解决这样的僵局，对于多国部队而言，办法之一可能是要向联合国寻求一项扩大化的命令以允许西方国家给与反叛军支持。

bilingual.source: Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico issued the most sweeping statewide mandate this fall, returning to a "stay at home" order on Monday that will last two weeks.
bilingual.target: 新墨西哥州州长米歇尔·卢安·格里森今年秋季发布了全州范围内最广泛的命令，周一恢复了为期两周的“居家令”。

bilingual.source: Thus, if the United States presses for a broader mandate, the coalition could begin to splinter, making the pursuit of coherent Western policy difficult.
bilingual.target: 这样一来，如果美国强行支持这一项扩大化的命令，盟军则可能会出现意见分歧，这样就会使得在西方国家想要在内部达成一致的对利政策变得困难。

bilingual.source: This mandate finally acknowledged that crimes against children should take priority over bureaucratic church policies that served to cloak rogue priests and bishops in a fog of ecclesiastical evasion.
bilingual.target: 这项命令最终认可针对孩子的犯罪比官僚主义的教会政策应优先考虑。在教会机构逃避责任的情况下，教会政策往往被用来保护劣迹斑斑的牧师和主教。

yingyinNormal.en: Cousin Kaidu, you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
yingyinNormal.zh: 海都兄弟，你忘了祖父的在天之灵交给我们的任务。

yingyinNormal.en: A mandate to spread our customs, our cultures, our very way of life, to every corner beneath the blue sky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要将我们的习俗，我们的文化，我们的生活方式，散播到蓝天下每一个角落。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 强制执行; 委托办理

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 管理；经营；设法继续生存；对付过去；处理；应付；主管；掌管；承受；当（运动队或演出者）的经理人

examination_example.sentence: But are such government <highlight>mandates</highlight> even necessary?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这样的政府授权有必要吗？

examination_example.sentence: Progressives often support diversity <highlight>mandates</highlight> as a path to equality and a way to level the playing field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进步人士通常支持将多样性授权作为实现平等和公平竞争环境的途径。

sense_info_list.zh: 强制执行; 委托办理

examination_example.sentence: Not everyone will agree with the authors' policy ideas, which range from <highlight>mandating</highlight> more holiday time to reducing tax incentives for American homebuyers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非每个人都会赞同作者有关政策的种种建议，其中包括批准更多的休假时间以及减少对美国购房人的税收激励。

examination_example.sentence: L.A. Unified has produced an inflexible policy which <highlight>mandates</highlight> homework may no longer count for more than 10% of a student's academic grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 洛杉矶联合学区制定了一项硬性规定，责令家庭作业在学生学业成绩中所占比例不得超过10%。

examination_example.sentence: This proposed <highlight>mandate</highlight> was born of frustration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项提议的任务是出于挫败感。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Some philanthropic (慈善的) funders, including the Wellcome Trust in London, also <highlight>mandate</highlight> open data from their grant recipients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些慈善资助者，包括伦敦的韦尔科姆信托基金，也要求公开他们赠款接受者的数据。

examination_example.sentence: Those fears may be a factor in a lingering hesitation to share data even when publishing in journals that <highlight>mandate</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使被发表期刊要求共享数据，这些担心也可能成为导致一直犹豫的一个因素。
